price: Timizeni kipimo sawa sawa, wala msiwe katika wanao punja.
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ
footnotes: Shuaibu akawaamrisha kutimiza vipimo kwa ukamilifu wanapo pima, kwani ilikuwa ada yao kupunguza kwa pishi na mizani, kupunguza haki za watu kwa kuwapunja na kuwapimia kasoro.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
